title: Best for NYC: 5-Borough Launch!
desc: Come out on for the launch of the  Best for NYC   Challenge  across all five boroughs!? The Best for NYC Challenge encourages businesses to measure their social and environmental performance, a step above solely measuring financial performance, and provides connections to city and community resources to help businesses improve their impact on the city.? We will have keynote business leaders speaking to the Best for NYC Challenge and why it matters for your business, as well as the opportunity to meet other businesses in the local business community. Refreshments will be provided.? For more about the Best for NYC Challenge, check out? bestfor.nyc .? Come be a pioneer in this first-ever campaign of its kind in New York City!? Please select the relevant ticket for your borough from the following ticket options: Manhattan Date and time: Thursday, November 12th from?6:00-8:00 PM Location: Harlem Commonwealth Council (361 W 125th St, New York, NY 10027) Staten Island Date and time: ? Thursday, November 12th from?6:00-8:00 PM Location: Maker Space ( 450 Front St, Staten Island, NY 10304) Queens? Fordham Road, 7th Floor, Bronx, NY 10458)
